What cult?
Ancestral Cult. They are the most popular religious group around here. It seems even goblins give them high regards.

...This is why you should always keep your eyes open and report any suspicious activities.
Hmm? You must be the new ruler of this village. My name is Demitrius. Pleased to meet you.
This is the Mayor, Sir Arron. And my name is Rose. We are pleased to meet you as well.
Hmm? What were you talking about just now?
This is my mission, to explain to everyone the danger of Demons.
But since you had no idea, allow me to repeat myself for you.
Despite how peaceful this world might look to you, there are evil beings we call Demons, who always aim to invade and destroy all which is good for us.
Seems nasty. Why would they do this?
They feed on the world's life energy and since their world has become a barren wasteland, they have been attempting to come here for centuries.
But what do they look like?
They take many forms, but mostly they disguise as sentient beings. This is why you should be especially careful around any strangers.
They might lie about how they lost their memory or came from some other world, but our interrogations have shown it all to be lies.
Anyone, looking suspicious or having appeared from nowhere should be reported to Ancestral Cult immediately.
So we are doing our best to keep the peace.
*Gulp*
You are doing God's work, Demitrius, we'll make sure to contact you immediately.
If that's the only thing you've came for, we can do our best to help you with supplies on your way back.
I'm glad you asked. In fact, I have a cult's mission on my shoulders, I'd be pleased to have your help.
What could it be?
There has been a report about an unknown artefact located in nearby caverns. Sometimes such things appear in our world and if it's connected to Demons, it's my job to ensure it's harmless.
As you can see, I'm no fighter, so your escort would be greatly appreciated.
(With all respect, I think it would be best for us to refuse this task.)
Of course our mayor will gladly help you out, Father. He often skirmishes outside and can handle himself in battle.
... I guess we should've hurried with making those new laws.
I mean, we gladly will help you out, Father Demitrius.
I'm glad to know this village is so high spirited. Once you prepare, I'll be waiting for you at the exit.
